## PopulatableKumo.sendKUMO() method

Send KUMO tokens to an address.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
sendKUMO(toAddress: string, amount: Decimalish): Promise<PopulatedKumoTransaction<P, SentKumoTransaction<S, KumoReceipt<R, void>>>>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  toAddress | string | Address of receipient. |
|  amount | [Decimalish](./lib-base.decimalish.md) | Amount of KUMO to send. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[PopulatedKumoTransaction](./lib-base.populatedkumotransaction.md)<!-- -->&lt;P, [SentKumoTransaction](./lib-base.sentkumotransaction.md)<!-- -->&lt;S, [KumoReceipt](./lib-base.kumoreceipt.md)<!-- -->&lt;R, void&gt;&gt;&gt;&gt;
